entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
